title: Google Messages App sending mass texts instead of MMS to group chats all of a sudden
content:
Randomly today any time I send out a message in a group chat with one or more iPhone recipes, they get my replies as individual texts, and not as MMS (not into the group chat on their end). I have made no changes whatsoever and have no idea how or why this is happening.

Yes: I have the setting in the Google Messages App under Advanced set to "Send as MMS" and not set to "Send as mass text". That is clearly not the culprit or I wouldn't be posting here.

I've already tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app, didn't help.

I will also note that another friend of mine, also with a Pixel, also on Google Fi (like I am) is experiencing the same issue.
